page.title: 08FAILAND FARM
page.content: In Failand there is a farm at the bottom of a valley.There is a mud track leading and going from it.There were a lot of buildings which contained machinery such as tractors, or animals, but the main farm house was on the top right corner and was built of stone.The animals were allowed to roam free.The cows were leaving little messages all over the place.There was a manure dump covered over with black plastic sheets weighted down with old car tyres.The farmer told us a story about two peahens he had that both were eaten by foxes.A lot of the machinery was left lying around the farm.There was a sheep dog which was not very happy with our arrival.
